humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is an invasive ductal carcinoma measuring 3.5 cm. Based on the rules provided, a T2 tumor is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size is reported as 3.5 cm in the pathology report, which falls under T2 stage (T2: Tumor size 2.1 to 5.0 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
